about_the_game:
Get ready for a bone-chilling Match -3 adventure like never before in Halloween Trouble 5 Step into the eerie world of spooks and surprises, where the line between tricks and treats blurs, and mysteries abound.

In this latest installment of the Halloween Trouble series, you find yourself at the enigmatic Halloween Manor, a place filled with secrets, scares, and supernatural occurrences. As you arrive, you realize that your friends are nowhere to be found, and the atmosphere is dripping with an unsettling silence.

Explore the vast and daunting Halloween Manor room by room, each filled with perplexing puzzles and thrilling challenges. Collect trophies and unlock the secrets hidden within its walls. Can you match your way through the mysteries and reveal the truth?

Features

  • Earn gold and collect Trophies
  • Get into the Halloween mood!
  • Mysterious Storyline!
  • Match 3 gameplay that is easy to play but hard to master
  • Pipe Joining, Slider, Jigsaw, and Memory minigames
  • 100 levels of fun match making
  • Gameplay options can be changed anytime

Get ready for a bone-chilling Match -3 adventure like never before in Halloween Trouble 5 Step into the eerie world of spooks and surprises, where the line between tricks and treats blurs, and mysteries abound.

In this latest installment of the Halloween Trouble series, you find yourself at the enigmatic Halloween Manor, a place filled with secrets, scares, and supernatural occurrences. As you arrive, you realize that your friends are nowhere to be found, and the atmosphere is dripping with an unsettling silence.

Explore the vast and daunting Halloween Manor room by room, each filled with perplexing puzzles and thrilling challenges. Collect trophies and unlock the secrets hidden within its walls. Can you match your way through the mysteries and reveal the truth?

Features

  • Earn gold and collect Trophies
  • Get into the Halloween mood!
  • Mysterious Storyline!
  • Match 3 gameplay that is easy to play but hard to master
  • Pipe Joining, Slider, Jigsaw, and Memory minigames

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10 Yosemite
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Halloween Trouble 5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Halloween Trouble 5 is a Match 3 game that invites you to enter a spine-tingling world of mystery and excitement. Explore the haunted manor, solve eerie puzzles, and rescue your friends in this captivating match-3 adventure.
